languages.text: "Йегер. Значит, это под твоим надзором живая десятина погрязла в ереси. У тебя есть люди и оружие, но на вверенном тебе участке полный бардак. Такая плохая охрана священной подати граничит с изменой".

"Yeager. So, it is under your watch that the living tithe has fallen into heresy. You have the men and the weapons, yet the sector in your charge is an utter mess. Such poor stewardship of the sacred tribute borders on treason."
languages.original_text: "Йегер. Значит, это под твоим надзором живая десятина погрязла в ереси. У тебя есть люди и оружие, но на вверенном тебе участке полный бардак. Такая плохая охрана священной подати граничит с изменой".

languages.text: «Yeager. De modo que el diezmo viviente ha caído en la herejía bajo su mando. Tiene el personal y las armas y, sin embargo, el sector a su cargo es un absoluto desastre. Un cuidado tan pésimo del tributo sagrado es prácticamente traición».
languages.original_text: "Yeager. So, it is under your watch that the living tithe has fallen into heresy. You have the men and the weapons, yet the sector in your charge is an utter mess. Such poor stewardship of the sacred tribute borders on treason."

traits.locale_text: «Yeager. De modo que el diezmo viviente ha caído en la herejía bajo su mando. Tiene el personal y las armas y, sin embargo, el sector a su cargo es un absoluto desastre. Un cuidado tan pésimo del tributo sagrado es prácticamente traición».

languages.text: “也就是说，在你的监管之下，耶格尔，那些生物资源沦为了异端分子。你明明拥有人手、武器，可你负责监管的区域却一塌糊涂。对神圣的贡品管理不善，这几乎就等同于叛国。”
languages.original_text: "Yeager. So, it is under your watch that the living tithe has fallen into heresy. You have the men and the weapons, yet the sector in your charge is an utter mess. Such poor stewardship of the sacred tribute borders on treason."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，在你的监管之下，耶格尔，那些生物资源沦为了异端分子。你明明拥有人手、武器，可你负责监管的区域却一塌糊涂。对神圣的贡品管理不善，这几乎就等同于叛国。”

languages.text: 「イェーガー。それで、異端に落ちた生きている租税はお前の監視下にあるものだ。お前には兵士があり、武器もある。だが、担当セクターは手の付けようのない混乱状態だ。聖なる租税のそのようなずさんな管理は反逆に値する」
languages.original_text: "Yeager. So, it is under your watch that the living tithe has fallen into heresy. You have the men and the weapons, yet the sector in your charge is an utter mess. Such poor stewardship of the sacred tribute borders on treason."

traits.locale_text: 「イェーガー。それで、異端に落ちた生きている租税はお前の監視下にあるものだ。お前には兵士があり、武器もある。だが、担当セクターは手の付けようのない混乱状態だ。聖なる租税のそのようなずさんな管理は反逆に値する」

languages.text: « Yeager. C'est donc sous votre supervision que la dîme vivante a sombré dans l'hérésie. Vous avez les hommes et les armes nécessaires, et pourtant, le secteur qui vous a été confié est un véritable chantier. Une telle désinvolture dans l'administration du tribut sacré confine à la trahison. »
languages.original_text: "Yeager. So, it is under your watch that the living tithe has fallen into heresy. You have the men and the weapons, yet the sector in your charge is an utter mess. Such poor stewardship of the sacred tribute borders on treason."

traits.locale_text: « Yeager. C'est donc sous votre supervision que la dîme vivante a sombré dans l'hérésie. Vous avez les hommes et les armes nécessaires, et pourtant, le secteur qui vous a été confié est un véritable chantier. Une telle désinvolture dans l'administration du tribut sacré confine à la trahison. »

languages.text: "Yeager. Sorumluluğun altındaki canlı aşar, kâfirlik yolundan gitti demek. Emrinde adam ve silahlar var fakat sana emanet edilen sektör tam bir keşmekeş hâlinde. Kutsal aşarın böylesine kötü yönetilmesi, ihanetten sayılabilir."
languages.original_text: "Yeager. So, it is under your watch that the living tithe has fallen into heresy. You have the men and the weapons, yet the sector in your charge is an utter mess. Such poor stewardship of the sacred tribute borders on treason."

traits.locale_text: "Yeager. Sorumluluğun altındaki canlı aşar, kâfirlik yolundan gitti demek. Emrinde adam ve silahlar var fakat sana emanet edilen sektör tam bir keşmekeş hâlinde. Kutsal aşarın böylesine kötü yönetilmesi, ihanetten sayılabilir."

languages.text: "Yeager. Unter Eurer Aufsicht ist der lebende Zehnt also der Ketzerei verfallen. Obwohl ihr ausreichend Männer und Waffen habt, versinkt Euer Sektor im Chaos. Eine derart nachlässige Verwaltung des heiligen Tributs grenzt an Verrat."
languages.original_text: "Yeager. So, it is under your watch that the living tithe has fallen into heresy. You have the men and the weapons, yet the sector in your charge is an utter mess. Such poor stewardship of the sacred tribute borders on treason."
